definition: to leave (a message etc)/to retain/to stay/to remain/to keep/to preserve
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to leave some leeway/to allow for the unpredictable

sentences.english: Sufficient space should be given to avoid mix-ups and cross-contamination.
sentences.chinese: 留有足夠的空間以防止混批和交叉污染。

sentences.english: There's still some classic Chinese old world charm here.
sentences.chinese: 還是留有中國的古典美。

sentences.english: Be sure there’s spaces between things, so you’re not rushed.
sentences.chinese: 要確保每件事之間都留有餘地，這樣你就不會太匆忙。

sentences.english: Save a area for yourself, before going out to love.
sentences.chinese: 在自己面前應該一直留有一個哋方，然後去愛。

sentences.english: She had the sweet scent of my lavender soap.
sentences.chinese: 她身上還留有我那塊薰衣草皁的香甜的味道。

sentences.english: Police believe the perpetrators who should be left scratch marks on her tower.
sentences.chinese: 警方相信兇手身上應留有姬塔抓傷的痕跡。

sentences.english: A minute examination revealed fingerprints on a glass.
sentences.chinese: 經詳細檢查後發現一隻玻璃杯上留有指紋印。

sentences.english: It was true. He did have dabs of milk on his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 果然，他的嘴角還留有奶漬。

sentences.english: Not seeking to get out, just leave the whole body.
sentences.chinese: 不求全身而退，只求留有全屍。

sentences.english: The gaps between the battens are wide enough for deportees to thrust their hands through.
sentences.chinese: 木條與木條間留有相當大的空隙，手可以伸出。

sentences.english: He wrote a book of poetry, and he was a both civil and military general.
sentences.chinese: 留有詩集一部，是住文武兼備的將軍。

sentences.english: There's scraps of paper with his notes on leadership.
sentences.chinese: 還有一些紙片留有他所做的關於領導的筆記。

sentences.english: I believe that happiness is so important, it should not be left to chance.
sentences.chinese: 我相信幸福是這麼重要，他應該留有僥倖心理。
這條路留有很深的車轍。

sentences.english: The container must be packed to provide air space for circulation of the fumigant.
sentences.chinese: 集裝箱內必須留有一定的空間以便熏蒸劑循環。

sentences.english: Inflation's repercussions were imprinted on the expansion history of the universe.
sentences.chinese: 膨脹反彈在宇宙的膨脹歷史中留有印記。

definition: to leave behind/to stay behind/to remain/to keep/not to let (sb) go
to hold in storage/to retain/to harbor (feelings)/to entertain (sentiments)/(of abstract things) to exist/there is
to keep/to preserve/extant/to remain (from the past)
to keep/to retain/to have reservations (about sth)/to hold back (from saying sth)/to put aside for later
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to leave some leeway/to allow for the unpredictable
